TextLibrary.Text: Guess what? I've been buildin' a detector device that can pinpoint the location for bits o' the Great Machine. Well ye'll never believe...

Guess what? I've been buildin' a detector device that can pinpoint the location for bits o' the Great Machine. Well ye'll never believe...
Oh, aye, I have. It's in a Worm Cave southeast o' Dhun-Kor. Ye're comin' arent' ye? 'Cos I mean it wouldna do to leave a thing o' such beauty in a dusty ol' cave with...
